chunk:
Glo skin Beauty Remedy Gel

Brand: Glo Skin Beauty

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Hydrocortisone 1%, Aqua (Water/Eau), Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Olivate, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Seed Oil, Squalane, Sorbitan Olivate, Bisabolol, Carbomer, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Hedychium Coronarium (White Ginger) Root Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract,

Squalane, Sorbitan Olivate, Bisabolol, Carbomer, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Hedychium Coronarium (White Ginger) Root Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Phenylethyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice

Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Phenylethyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice Powder, Phytic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Xanthan Gum, Calcium Gluconate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Gluconolactone (and) Sodium Benzoate

Directions: Apply to the affected area no more than 4 times daily. Not for continued use longer than 6 months.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
